description:
Chansey is a kind hearted Normal type Pokémon often seen helping out at Pokémon Centers around the world. Known as the Egg Pokémon it is often seen carrying an egg around in its pouch. Chansey gives their eggs to injured people and Pokémon, and are known to be delicious. Chansey are rare and few in number outside of a Pokémon Center. In the Anime it is revealed that Chansey attend a nursing school. Jessie of Team Rocket was not accepted into the same school as Nurse Joys, and was forced to attend a Chansey nursing school where she became friends with a Chansey. Chansey is the best pokemon ever!
Chansey is the evolved form of Happiny and the pre-evolved form of Blissey
name: Lucky
